snippet.name: Test Method
snippet.starttext:
<cffunction name="test$${test name}">
		<cfscript>
		var event = "";
		
		//Place any variables on the form or URL scope to test the handler.
		//FORM.name = "luis"
		event = execute("$${event to test:}");
			
		//Do your asserts below
		
			
		</cfscript>
	</cffunction>
